body.name: Men's Lightweight Water-Resistant Packable Hooded Puffer Jacket
features: Fabric type Shell: 100% Nylon; Lining: 100% Nylon; Fill: 100% Polyester
REGULAR FIT: Comfortable, easy fit through the shoulders, chest, and waist.
WATER-RESISTANT NYLON TAFFETA: Nylon plain weave shell and lining fabric. Fully lined, quilted and insulated. (100% polyester shell and lining fabric on Marble print colorway).
COLD-WEATHER STYLING: Stay warm in this versatile water-resistant lightweight puffer jacket featuring a full-length center-front zipper and hood.
DETAILS: Two zippered hand pockets and elasticated hood opening, cuffs and bottom opening. Jacket packs neatly into included carrying bag with a drawstring closure.
body.description: We listen to customer feedback and fine-tune every detail to ensure our clothes are more comfortable, higher quality, and longer lasting—at affordable prices for the whole family.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #1,144 in Our Brands (See Top 100 in Our Brands) #2 in Men's Down Jackets & Coats

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Deal! Love the compact storing feature! Functional & Travel Friendly
reviews.reviewText: 01/24: "Chilly" Festival Friendly! Wanted something to keep me warm in 40-50 degree weather, but that I could also compress into a hydration back pack ! This was perfect! .... love the ability to easily roll it into the included compact bag; I just wear with the bag attached as it arrived... u don't feel it...and you'll never lose it....it looks good on... fits great.... & was warm enough - it really does retain body heat.... all that plus its lightweight w/no added bulk! Ive had no issue with the zipper...but remember its only like a 30-40 dollar jacket...so just be patient & careful with it is all and don't expect to wear it snug and not have an issue with the zipper eventually ... Will also be taking it snowboarding soon. Very happy with this affordable purchase. Great value. (Size M, Black)UPDATE: 02/24.... purchased a 2nd jacket in Size: L: .... worked perfect for me as a snowboarding mid layer! ... as a 1st timer to snow, this made it easy for me paired with just a balaclava hoodie, a set of thermals, a bib pant, snowboarding socks & gloves I was comfortably warm as it was snowing with temps in the 20s described as a part cloudy, part sunny day with 2inches of snowfall expected (after 11inches the day prior) .... . I didn't need my top layer jacket... I stayed warm ... I remained dry .... I ended up purchasing the Sz: L to allow for layering & for more movement. It worked perfectly ... highly recommend...Item travels EXCELLENT! .... easy to care for... will likely purchase other colors as needed.... so for me at: 5'7", 170 ... size M for daily casual wear, and size L for winter sports at a bargain price & nothing bulky to store as I live in a tropical climate. Stores away easily taking up no space until the next trip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beyond 5 Stars Unmatched Excellence in the Amazon Essentials Packable Hooded Puffer Jacke
reviews.reviewText: If I could give the this Jacket more than 5 stars, I absolutely would! This jacket has exceeded all expectations, setting a new standard for excellence.From the moment I unpacked it, the quality was evident. The lightweight design doesn't compromise on warmth, making it a perfect companion for various weather conditions. The water-resistant feature has come in handy during unexpected drizzles, keeping me dry without sacrificing style.The packable nature of this jacket is a game-changer. It folds down neatly, making it my go-to travel companion. The hood is an added bonus, providing extra protection when needed. The fit is just right, striking the balance between comfort and a sleek look.In terms of value for money, this jacket is unparalleled. Its durability, style, and functionality make it a standout in the world of outerwear. If there were a perfect 10-star rating, the Jacket would undoubtedly earn it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Almost a perfect fit
reviews.reviewText: I bought a few similar jackets from different manufacturers and the plan was to keep the one that fit the best. This one came in second place, and I had to return it because another one fit me a little better. I ordered the small, and I am 5'6" tall and 150 lbs with short limbs and a wide frame. Nothing fits me well, so I usually have to settle for something that is close but not perfect. This jacket fit perfectly, but the sleeves and overall length were just a little bit longer than a competitor. I honestly would have kept this jacket if I had not tried the competitor's, because the extra length was negligible and comfortable. Generally speaking, this jacket style runs a little long in the sleeves for people like me with short arms. Then, if you buy a size extra-small (usually not available), it's too tight or too short in the overall length. This is a nice, well-constructed, lightweight jacket that feels warm. It's much lighter than a parka but it seems like it will work for cold and wet weather around 40-45 F. The hood also fits well without a hat and it seems like a very functional go-to jacket for cold rainy weather. The wrist elastic could be a little tighter in my opinion, but it's basically snug around the wrist. You can probably put a few stitches in the material and make it tighter with some clever sewing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great jacket, but not quite for me
reviews.reviewText: I love the color of this jacket (green) and the feel and the weight, but it was just one of those things where the fit didn’t quite work for me. When my arms were all the way down it was fine, but if I started to raise my arms at all it would kind of bunch up and pull weird at my chest and back, if you know you know. I have pretty broad boulder shoulders so this isn’t a rare occurrence for me. I still think this is a great jacket and worth trying, it will likely fit and be comfortable for most people, I just have odd body dimensions. It was real nice and warm too and I love that it can be packed into a bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I enjoy Amazon essentials for quality and value.
reviews.reviewText: This is not my first Amazon jacket; I have the vest and non-hooded versions of this hooded jacket. I do layers most of the fall, winter, and spring. Heavy winter I pull out the “big coats”, but this lightweight hooded puffer jacket is perfect for cooler days but not deep winter. I layer this with a rain jacket on windy days or rainy days. Works great to layer with fleece coats also. Zippers all work great and are easy to use. Lightweight and compressed into the included carry bag makes packing for travel convenient. Fits as expected for size. I appreciate the hood on those chilly days when I must pump gas without having to keep up with a hat/beanie to keep my head and ears warm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's warm and cheap.
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this packable jacket for extra warmth at work where I wear a uniform. It's warm, it's compact, and does the job.This jacket is perfect to keep in your trunk just in case you need a little extra warmth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good, but not close to great
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for a insulated hoody to stand around in moderately cool temps at a great price, then this is the hoody for you. Does a decent job of keeping you warm and isn't uncomfortable.If you are looking for a jacket to move around in, look elsewhere. If you raise your arms, the jacket will come up to chest. The pits have the worst cut I have ever seen. The material is also sticky when perspetating.It works as a normal jacket, but isn't going to replace the much more expensive brands for hiking, backpacking, insulating layer, etc.

These jackets, both the mens and women's are wonderful. I found myself reaching for mine every time - over heavier coats since these are so light and comfy. I finally bought one for my husband and he too wore his out and so this is the fourth such jacket we have purchased. They last through continual daily wear, normally about 3 or four hours a day from the cooler fall evenings to cooler spring days. I find we get about a year out of them, though I suppose they would last longer if we did not get them mucked up at the cuffs from the dogs. I good, not too costly jacket useful for all but the coldest winter days if you wear a sweater under.
Una prenda de muy buena calidad, muy ligera pero bastante térmica.

Ho preso questo capo perchè un vecchio giubbino trapuntato ormai mi sta piccolo (taglia M) e dà fastidio nei movimenti, oltre ad essere poco elasticizzato. Ho scelto questo giubbino trapuntato Amazon, soprattutto per il prezzo contenuto, e avendo acquistato altri capi Essentials mi sono sempre trovato bene. Ebbene, ottimo, davvero ha superato le mie aspettative, niente da indiviare a capi di marca, per 30€ lo reputo un solenne affare. E' caldo, perfetto per periodo autunno/pre-inverno, molto comodo, essendo in tutto e per tutto elasticizzato, ma nel contempo copre benissimo e aderisce molto bene al corpo, rendendolo anche gradevole alla vista (niente effetto mongolfiera, per intenderci 😂😂😂). Unico appunto, e ringrazio i molti utenti che hanno recensito: io solitamente vesto 48 alias L, e sappiamo tutti che ormai le taglie sono come le opinioni 😉 , avevo in carrello la L, ma poi, leggendo bene, ho deciso di puntare su una M... PERFETTA!!! La L sarebbe stata abbondante!!! Consiglio anche io una taglia in meno a chi ordina. Prodotto straeccellente 👏👏👏👏👏

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Well, I was skeptical about this when I ordered it thinking that for such a low price it would be just about passable as a 'keep-it-in-my-bag-for-emergencies' type jacket but have found that I've worn it much more than my normal winter coat. Why? It's so light that you don't know you're wearing it, windproof, warm (surprisingly given that it's so thin and packs down into the supplied small bag), showerproof and comfortable. The warmth is the most surprising thing; -3 degrees today and I'm still not getting cold. And there was me looking at similar looking coats at double or three times this cost thinking they would be better. Buy one, they are simply brilliant.

Es buena chaqueta por la calidad precio, muy ligera y no pesa nada siendo muy cómoda, para entretiempo va muy bien.Pedí dos con tallas diferentes y me quede con la que mejor me quedaba devolviendo la otra. El sistema Prueba primero, paga después es una maravilla, te permite comprar varias prendas y en tu casa te las pruebas cómodamente y las que no te gustan o no te quedan bien las devuelves sin ningún problema y solo pagas lo que te quedes.
